text: Chelovek po svoyey nature interesuyetsya tol'ko zhizn'yu v dannyy moment. Yesli My okazhem yemu Svoyu milost' i daruyem yemu zdorov'ye i obil'nyy udel, a potom po Svoyey mudrosti lishim yego etikh blag, to on prikhodit v otchayaniye i teryayet vsyakuyu nadezhdu, chto My vernom yemu eti milosti, i dokhodit do kraynosti v svoyey neblagodarnosti za drugiye milosti, kotorymi on yeshcho pol'zuyetsya
